thread.title: Akshay Khanna & Prachi Desai to be a part of show 24?
thread.title_full: Akshay Khanna & Prachi Desai to be a part of show 24?

author: dR Admire
title: Akshay Khanna & Prachi Desai to be a part of show 24?
text: Akshay Khanna & Prachi Desai to be a part of show 24? Follow us on Social Media Tweet Read on... TV show 24 produced by Anil Kapoor productions is geared up to put on its season 2 very soon. As such, the show is heard to have roped in many popular faces from the industry this time. However, earlier we reported about Mandira Bedi not being a part of its season 2, a fresh gossip is now making the rounds. If reports are to be believed, celebrities like Akshay Khanna & Prachi Desai might be a part of 24 season 2. The reports also states that Anil is fond of Akshaye as such he had even casted him in his first production Gandhi, My Father. Also the producers of the show are in talks with Prachi and if things go well she would be a part of the show. Recently, Rajeev Khandelwal has made a comeback on TV with Sony TV's Reporters. Now if, Prachi accepts the production's proposal for 24, she would be seen following the lead. Well, the news is still awaiting a confirmation. We buzzed up Akshay and Prachi but there was no response till the time of filing the story. Keep watching this space for more updates...
